pages.text: Lurking in the shadows around the islands of the $(thing)Aether$(), $(thing)Cockatrice$() are a mutated, hostile cousin to the $(thing)Moa$(). From a distance, one may be easily confused for the other, but be wary, for $(thing)Cockatrice$() are known to spit intoxicating poison at whomever they decide looks like a nice lunch.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Cockatrice$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.

pages.name: Cockatrice
pages.drop1: minecraft:feather{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 2-3", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
